remarks: A device to add associativity to various sorts of internal operations. The definition is meaningful when ` g ` is a magma at least. (Contributed by FL, 1-Nov-2009.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-ass $p |- Ass = { g | A. x e. dom dom g A. y e. dom dom g A. z e. dom dom g ( ( x g y ) g z ) = ( x g ( y g z ) ) } $.
$d g x y z $.
